markdown.markdown:
Schedule goes here ```{r} rawdat <- read_xlsx("_math350_schedule.xlsx", sheet='weekly_schedule') # content rows content <- rawdat %>% filter(is.na(tnum)) # which rows have topic numbers tn <- rawdat %>% filter(!is.na(tnum)) %>% select(tnum, Topic) %>% mutate(start=0, end=0) for(t in 1:max(tn$tnum)){ tn$start[t] <- min(which(floor(content$Order)==t)) tn$end[t] <- max(which(floor(content$Order)==t)) } out <- content %>% # wrangle hw links separate(col=Do, into=c("hw.name", "hw.link", "hw.due"), sep="-| ") %>% mutate(Date = format(Date,"%m/%d"), hw.due = gsub("(", " \r\n Due (", hw.due, fixed=TRUE), hw.due = gsub(")", ")" , hw.due, fixed=TRUE), hw.sol = ifelse(!is.na(sol), sol, ""), Do = ifelse(!is.na(hw.name), paste0(sprintf("[%s](%s)", hw.name, hw.link), "
", hw.due, "
", hw.sol), NA), Notes = ifelse(!is.na(Notes),Notes, NA)) %>% select(Date, Topic, Notes, Read, Watch, Practice = Do, Assess=quiz) # highlight rows wk.labs <- "background-color: #bb9457; color: #fff;" hlt.wks <- "background-color: #6f1d1b; color: #fff;" ``` ```{r, results='asis'} out %>% kable(align="cllllcc", escape=FALSE) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "striped", "responsive", "bordered")) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[1], tn$start[1], tn$end[1], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[2], tn$start[2], tn$end[2], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[3], tn$start[3], tn$end[3], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[4], tn$start[4], tn$end[4], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[5], tn$start[5], tn$end[5], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[6], tn$start[6], tn$end[6], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[7], tn$start[7], tn$end[7], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[8], tn$start[8], tn$end[8], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[9], tn$start[9], tn$end[9], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% column_spec(1, width = "5%") %>% column_spec(2, width = "22%") %>% column_spec(3, width = "15%") %>% column_spec(4, width = "3%") %>% column_spec(5, width = "25%") %>% column_spec(6, width = "15%") %>% column_spec(7, width = "15%") ```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
Schedule goes here ```{r} # Read in schedule rawdat <- read_xlsx("_math350_schedule.xlsx", sheet='weekly_schedule') # content rows content <- rawdat %>% filter(is.na(tnum)) # which rows have topic numbers tn <- rawdat %>% filter(!is.na(tnum)) %>% select(tnum, Topic) %>% mutate(start=0, end=0) for(t in 1:max(tn$tnum)){ tn$start[t] <- min(which(floor(content$Order)==t)) tn$end[t] <- max(which(floor(content$Order)==t)) } out <- content %>% # wrangle hw links separate(col=Do, into=c("hw.name", "hw.link", "hw.due"), sep="-| ") %>% mutate(Date = format(Date,"%m/%d"), hw.due = gsub("(", " \r\n Due (", hw.due, fixed=TRUE), hw.due = gsub(")", ")" , hw.due, fixed=TRUE), hw.sol = ifelse(!is.na(sol), sol, ""), Do = ifelse(!is.na(hw.name), paste0(sprintf("[%s](%s)", hw.name, hw.link), "
", hw.due, "
", hw.sol), NA), Notes = ifelse(!is.na(Notes),Notes, NA)) %>% select(Date, Topic, Notes, Read, Watch, Practice = Do, Assess=quiz) # highlight rows wk.labs <- "background-color: #bb9457; color: #fff;" hlt.wks <- "background-color: #6f1d1b; color: #fff;" ``` ```{r, results='asis'} out %>% kable(align="cllllcc", escape=FALSE) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "striped", "responsive", "bordered")) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[1], tn$start[1], tn$end[1], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[2], tn$start[2], tn$end[2], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[3], tn$start[3], tn$end[3], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[4], tn$start[4], tn$end[4], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[5], tn$start[5], tn$end[5], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[6], tn$start[6], tn$end[6], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[7], tn$start[7], tn$end[7], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[8], tn$start[8], tn$end[8], label_row_css =wk.labs) %>% pack_rows(tn$Topic[9], tn$start[9], tn$end[9], label_row_css =hlt.wks) %>% column_spec(1, width = "5%") %>% column_spec(2, width = "22%") %>% column_spec(3, width = "15%") %>% column_spec(4, width = "3%") %>% column_spec(5, width = "25%") %>% column_spec(6, width = "15%") %>% column_spec(7, width = "15%") ```
